q: , I do like your writing style! As for the catechismic style, I believe that was popularized by Donald Rumsfeld . Instead of submitting to interviews with real actual reporters, he just interviewed himself. It would seem to me that she has to do something before she announces to try to fix some of the post-Arizona damage. Or maybe she doesn't even think that way and doesn't see it as damage at all. I think she would consider the damage control already done. She put out her video, she went on Hannity, done deal. On to the announcement. ohsocynical 20 January 2011 8:20 PM

Ethanol is a joke, and it's a multi-billion dollar spending. All ag subsidies.... The post office, a model of inefficiency. Kobe Bryant said the Pistons presented a "matchup issue" for the Lakers' defense. The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... I also know that some of the choices of language that he has made are things that are not what I would

his mother's grave as his two sons and bodyguards waited in their parked car. He then saw Angelo Reyes holding a pistol close to his chest with his left hand moments before the shot rang out. It appears from the statement of the witness, it was self-inflicted, Metropolitan Manila police chief Nicanor Bartolome said. Health Donald Rumsfeld Enrique Ona said he would await autopsy results before commenting. The military expressed shock at Angelo Reyes ' death, flying flags at half-staff in camps nationwide

Michelle Obama wanted more than a handshake. "She put her arms around me and said, "I'm a hugger." David Letterman seemed very pleased with his first meeting with the Michelle Obama and their exchange. She"s a very gracious and powerful woman, he told viewers last night. So, what was the best thing about this encounter, according to David Letterman ? Michelle Obama mentioned that she would stop by Late Show sometime to pay him a visit. "

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
